verses.verse: <S%G2316>God,<s%> having in the <S%G4181>past<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to the <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> at many <S%G4181>times<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in various <S%G4187>ways,<s%>

<S%G2980>has<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2078>end<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> his <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G5087>appointed<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G165>worlds.<s%>

His <S%G3739>Son<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> the <S%G541>radiance<s%> <S%G1391>of<s%> his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> very <S%G5481>image<s%> <S%G5287>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5287>substance,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G5342>upholding<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> by the <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G1411>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> when he <S%G4160>had<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> made <S%G2512>purification<s%> for <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> sat <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of the <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5308>high;<s%>

having <S%G1096>become<s%> so <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> than the <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> he has <S%G2816>inherited<s%> a more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> they <S%G846>have.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> to <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> did he <S%G2036>say<s%> at any <S%G4218>time,<s%> <S%G4771>"You<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>Son.<s%> <S%G4594>Today<s%> <S%G1080>have<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> become <S%G4571>your<s%> <S%G1080>father?<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G5207>Son?<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3825>Again,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G1521>brings<s%> in the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> he <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4352>"Let<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4314>of<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> he <S%G4675>says,<s%> "Your <S%G2362>throne,<s%> O <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1519>is<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> The <S%G4464>scepter<s%> of <S%G2118>uprightness<s%> is the <S%G4464>scepter<s%> <S%G932>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G932>Kingdom.<s%>

You have <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G458>iniquity;<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> has <S%G5548>anointed<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> with the <S%G1637>oil<s%> of <S%G20>gladness<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3353>fellows.<s%>"

<S%G2532>And,<s%> <S%G4771>"You,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> laid the <S%G2311>foundation<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> The <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G5495>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

<S%G846>They<s%> will <S%G622>perish,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1265>continue.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3956>all<s%> will grow <S%G3822>old<s%> like a <S%G2440>garment<s%> <S%G5613>does.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5616>As<s%> a <S%G4018>mantle,<s%> you will <S%G1667>roll<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1667>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they will be <S%G236>changed;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G846>same.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4675>Your<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G1587>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1587>fail.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> <S%G1161>of<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> has he <S%G2046>told<s%> at any <S%G4218>time,<s%> <S%G2521>"Sit<s%> at <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2193%G99999>until<s%> I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> the <S%G5286>footstool<s%> of <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet?<s%>"

<S%G3780>Aren't<s%> <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3010>serving<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> sent <S%G649>out<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> do <S%G3010>service<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the sake of those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G4991>salvation?<s%>
